dreams.title: Bird Lover in Peril
dreams.entry: I had a lover who turned into a bird person, I was desperately trying to find them medical care in a hospital. People wanted to study them and I was trying to sneak around and find medicine for them or someone who would help him.

dreams.title: Animorphs???
dreams.entry: There was an oil spill that created contaminated algae growth. Nature evolved in weird ways because of it. Crane/pelican with human body. Dolphin with human legs and arms and torso. You name it, it existed.

dreams.title: Detroit: Become Human... Reversed
dreams.entry: Dream about being an Android. Ethan is still human, although life expectancy in future is way longer than that of days gone by, but death cannot be escaped.
